about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of the last standing drop of water, tasked with defending against the relentless assault of evil sponges determined to absorb every remaining drop. Although you stand alone, you possess all the water knowledge needed to create impressive structures and fend off your enemies. Do you have what it takes to survive?



Enemies
Encounter a wide variety of enemies, from peasants sponges to ghosts and cowboys! King Sponge is sending his all army towards you, so be prepared to face lots of types of enemies coming wave after wave. Some of them will have some special powers or abilities, others will just try to hunt you down, are you prepared to face them?


Build your strategy
Build your strategy and defend yourself against your worst enemies. Use combinations of towers, and walls to defeat them and to make the King Sponge cry in his waterless kingdom because he can't get rid of the last drop of water!


Boss
Did you think that this game was made only to face hard normal enemies? Well, that's not the case because, after several waves, a mini-boss will appear and try to do the King's job! After a mini-boss is defeated, you may choose one of three special items to help on your journey, but be careful, because after a mini-boss, a much more powerful boss will confront you!


Key Features
  • Unique Setting: Summoned to the middle of a vast desert, you must collect precious water drops that serve as your currency and your health. Use them wisely to build and upgrade defenses.
  • Strategic Gameplay: Construct towers, collectors, and other vital structures to gain an advantage over wave after wave of increasingly powerful enemies.
  • Resource Management: Balance your use of water drops between building defenses and maintaining your health.
  • Challenging Enemies: Face off against four different types of enemies, each becoming stronger over time.

How to Play
  • Building Structures:
    - Press "B" or click the icon in the bottom-left corner to open the building menu.
    - Select the type of building you wish to construct. Note that some structures require unlocking via an anvil.
  • Anvils:
    - The anvil is a critical structure for upgrading and unlocking new buildings.
    - Anvils are one-time use only, so use them strategically.
  • Collectors:
    - Collectors generate water drops over time, which are crucial for both currency and health.
    - Build as many collectors as possible early on, as it will become more challenging later.
    - To build a collector, click on the lakes scattered across the map and select the collector option.
  • Currency and Health:
    - Both currency and health are represented by water drops. Spend them wisely to maintain a balance between building defenses and staying alive.

Tips for Survival
  • Prioritize Collectors: Early in the game, focus on constructing collectors to ensure a steady supply of water drops.
  • Upgrade Strategically: Use anvils to unlock and upgrade buildings that will provide the most benefit against upcoming waves of enemies.
  • Adapt to Enemies: Pay attention to the types of enemies and adapt your strategy accordingly to maximize your chances of survival.

With these strategies in mind, we wish you the best of luck in your quest to protect the last drops of water from those insatiable sponges!

Are you ready to face the challenge? Download now and prove your worth!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
